text:
@PressSec Too bad it doesn't break your heart, that @realDonaldTrump has let over 130,000 Americans die from COVID-19 due to his lack of, well just about everything.

Or claim Russia hasn't paid to kill our troops. https://t.co/xDagT3oSaJ
